org.gearvrf

Interface GVRDrawFrameListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GVRCameraSceneObject, GVRWebViewSceneObject

    public interface GVRDrawFrameListener
    Implement this interface to create a callback that's called once per frame. Activate your callbacks with GVRContext.registerDrawFrameListener(GVRDrawFrameListener); deactivate a callback with GVRContext.unregisterDrawFrameListener(GVRDrawFrameListener). Per-frame callbacks are called after the 'one shot' queue has been emptied and before GVRScript.onStep().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDrawFrame(float frameTime)
      Called each time a frame is drawn.

    • Method Detail

      • onDrawFrame

        void onDrawFrame(float frameTime)
        Called each time a frame is drawn. Callbacks are called (from GVRViewManager.onDrawFrame()) in subscription-order, after any 'one shot' callbacks and before GVRScript.onStep().
        Parameters:
        frameTime - Seconds since the previous frame - see GVRContext.getFrameTime()
